title: Officials say at least 189 bodies found at Colorado funeral home, up from about 115
description: Officials say at least 189 bodies were found decaying at Colorado funeral home, up from about 115 reported earlier

title: North Carolina man arrested for threats against Jewish organization
description: A North Carolina man was arrested for making threats against a Jewish organization in the wake of the Hamas terrorist attack on Israel.

title: FDA considers proposed rule to ban formaldehyde in hair products
description: Frequent use of hair-straightening products that include formaldehyde has been linked to an increase risk of cancer.

title: WEB - LINK - BREAKING NEWS LIVE BLOG
How US military moves, including 2,000 Marines, will play into Israel-Gaza conflict
description: The U.S. goal is deterrence, not to get involved in the fighting.

title: Men charged with kidnapping and torturing  man in case of mistaken identity
description: The Department of Justice charged three Florida men with kidnapping, waterboarding, and torturing a man.

title: At least 500 killed in strike on Gaza hospital: Gaza Health Ministry
description: Hundreds have been killed in a strike on a Gaza hospital, the Gaza Health Ministry said.

title: Ukraine uses US-supplied long-range missiles for 1st time in Russia airbase attack
description: Ukraine uses U.S.-supplied ATACMS long-range missiles for first time, hitting two Russian airbases in occupied territory.

title: Rafah crossing: Why are people, aid stuck at Egypt-Gaza border?
description: Thousands of people are seeking refuge at the Rafah crossing on the Gaza-Egypt border as Israeli airstrikes continue to pummel the Palestinian territory.

title: WATCH:  Hundreds confirmed dead in Gaza hospital strike
description: At least 500 are dead in what might be the deadliest strike since the Oct. 7 attack on Israel.

title: Deputy fatally shoots exonerated man who was wrongfully convicted for 16 years
description: A Georgia deputy fatally shot an exonerated man who was wrongfully imprisoned for 16 years.

title: NYC to limit shelter stay for asylum-seekers with children
description: Starting next week, city officials will begin notifying some families that they have 60 days to find alternative housing.

title: WATCH:  Hamas: 71 killed in Israeli strikes near Rafah
description: Palestinians say the strikes targeted Rafah, which is the sole border crossing between Gaza and Egypt. It remains closed.

title: ADL official on anti-Jewish, Muslim hate: 'Our fight is often one that is together'
description: "Unfortunately, as the FBI has already indicated, is that synagogues and mosques are, in particular, vulnerable right now to potential attacks," Oren Segal said.

title: 'Specter of death' hangs over Gaza as aid group wait for access, UN official says
description: Humanitarian aid and relief convoys carrying essential items have been streaming towards Egypt's Sinai Peninsula, parked outside Gaza, awaiting access to the enclave.

title: French prosecutor: Alleged school stabber declared allegiance to Islamic State
description: France’s anti-terror prosecutor says a suspected Islamic extremist declared allegiance to the Islamic State group before fatally stabbing a teacher in a school attack last week

title: Retail sales up 0.7% in September as American consumers defy rising prices, interest
description: Americans showed their steadfast resilience and kept spending in September even as they grappled with higher prices, interest rates and a host of other headwinds piling up

title: WATCH:  Israeli ground forces gather near Gaza border
description: Israel's military continued to mass troops and vehicles on Gaza's border in preparation for a ground offensive.

title: Gaza conditions worsen following Israeli onslaught after Hamas attack
description: Israel has unleashed hundreds of airstrikes into Gaza after the militant group Hamas launched a terrorist attack in Israel on Oct. 7.

title: Girl Scout troop treasurer arrested for stealing over $12,000: Police
description: A former Girl Scout troop treasurer has been arrested and charged with felony theft after allegedly stealing over $12,000 from the troop during her time at the helm.

title: Russian parliament moves to rescind ratification of global nuclear test ban
description: The lower house of the Russian parliament has given preliminary approval to a bill revoking the ratification of a global nuclear test ban

title: How Quran burnings in Sweden have increased threats from Islamic militants
description: The killing of two Swedish citizens in an attack in Brussels has shocked the Scandinavian country, although the government has been warning for months that Swedes were at greater risk since a recent string of public desecrations of the Quran holy book ...

title: Amazon, Tripadvisor team up to battle fake reviews while FTC seeks ban
description: Some of the most used platforms for travel and online shopping said Tuesday they’re going to team up to battle fake reviews

title: Poland's ruling conservatives lose majority in parliament to centrist coalition
description: A complete ballot count confirms that three coalition parties that vowed to restore democratic standards in Poland together won over 54% of the votes in the nation’s weekend election

title: India's Supreme Court refuses to legalize same-sex marriage, says it is up to govt
description: India’s top court has refused to legalize same-sex marriages, with the chief justice of the country saying that it was up to Parliament to create such a law

title: Brussels shooter who killed 2 soccer fans in 'act of terrorism' shot dead by police
description: A suspected Tunisian extremist accused of killing two Swedish soccer fans in a brazen shooting in Brussels has died of his injuries, ABC News has learned.

title: Police shoot dead suspected extremist accused of killing 2 Swedes in Brussels
description: Two Swedish soccer fans were killed in a brazen shooting on a Brussels street.

title: Putin begins visit in China underscoring ties amid Ukraine war
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has arrived in Beijing on a visit that underscores China’s support for Moscow during its war in Ukraine as well as Russian backing for China’s bid to expand its economic and diplomatic influence abroad through its decad...

title: Candidates wrangle over abortion policy in Kentucky gubernatorial debate
description: Democratic Gov. Andy Beshear and Republican Attorney General Daniel Cameron have accused each other of taking extreme positions on abortion policy

title: Georgia deputy shoots, kills man who spent 16 years in prison on wrongful conviction
description: A man who spent more than 16 years in prison in Florida on a wrongful conviction has been fatally shot by a sheriff’s deputy in Georgia during a traffic stop

title: The Supreme Court orders makers of gun parts to comply with rules on ghost guns
description: The Supreme Court has ordered two internet sellers of gun parts to comply with a Biden administration regulation aimed at ghost guns, firearms that are difficult to trace because they lack serial numbers

title: Zipcar fined after allowing customers rent vehicles with open, unrepaired recalls
description: Zipcar has been slapped with a $300,000 fine after U.S. regulators found that the car-sharing company allowed customers to rent vehicles with open recalls, violating federal motor safety law

title: Californians plead guilty in $600 million nationwide catalytic converter theft scheme
description: Three members of a California family have pleaded guilty to conspiracy for their role in a ring that shipped $600 million worth of stolen catalytic converters from California to New Jersey
